org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class SimpleCachingItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.SimpleCachingItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class SimpleCachingItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
    A simple cached item scorer that remembers the result for the last user id it scored.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector scores)
        For each input, check with the cached user id. If the requested items is a subset of the cached items, use the cache; otherwise score the new items and update the cached scores.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.
